archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.1.9: Hardware should be categorised from a security perspective (e.g. as low, moderate, high or critical) based on the business processes supported and the classification of information processed, stored or transmitted.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
